info.title: CheckRoute API
info.description: This API takes in the name of two EVE Online star systems and returns a route between them - if one exists. If there are any dangerous systems on the route, this will be called out.

post.summary: Get route between two EVE Online star systems
post.description: Returns a route between the starting and ending star systems, along with any potential warnings regarding dangerous systems.

startingSystem.description: The name of the starting star system.

endingSystem.description: The name of the ending star system.

schema.example:
Route: Jita -> Maurasi -> Itamo -> Mitsolen -> Mahtista
Warnings: There were 5 ship kills in Itamo in the last hour.

400.description: Invalid input - one or more system names were not found.
